sections.title: About
sections.descr: Maxime Tavernier, 25 years old, young graduate in computer engineering, I like to say that I am an artist. Not only artistically speaking, but also professionally speaking. Create is my main motivation, and share: a success.

sections.title: Portfolio
sections.descr: As a computer engineer, I specialize myself in web and mobile development. I am also an art and sport love, in general. For more informations, I invite you to consult my portfolio. (Site under maintenance)

sections.title: Activity
sections.descr: Code passionate, I develop all kind of project, professional, but also personal. You can find here the list of my completed and current projects. (Site under maintenance)
